description:
Shiren is a Shogunate official, infatuated with http://anidb.net/ch18313 [Koza]. He becomes http://anidb.net/ch18312 [Mukuro]`s collaborator in double-crossing http://anidb.net/ch4865 [Mugen] and keeping the gold for themselves. He is slashed dead by Mugen at the end of everything. As he and Mukuro are the only two people who know where the gold is hidden, it is never recovered.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shiren
